data.author: Rhiannon Lucy Cosslett
data.title: What does Melania’s merciless hat tell us? Designers are suddenly eager to dress the Trumps | Rhiannon Lucy Cosslett
data.description: The first time round, high fashion shunned the president’s family. Now industry figures are flocking to themMussolini once said that “any power whatsoever is destined to fail before fashion. If fashion says skirts are short, you will not succeed in lengthening them, even with the guillotine.” For that reason, far-right authoritarian movements have long attempted to capture the fashion system. We can argue endlessly about whether the new Trump administration can be compared to fascism. I think that it meets most of the key traits identified by Umberto Eco, but others will disagree...

data.description: The new administration wants to slash aid for health, food and housing, but many of those programs now reach the struggling working class he is courting.

data.author: DAVID KLEPPER / AP
data.title: Senate Confirms John Ratcliffe to Lead CIA, Giving Trump His Second Cabinet Member
data.description: The Senate confirmed John Ratcliffe as CIA director by a vote of 74-25.
